channel.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
channel.description:
I need help making a hamachi server. Not no-ip so dont post here if its about no-ip
thanks

item.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
item.dc:creator: @katzcinky katzcinky
item.description:
@katzcinky wrote:

but befor u run the server, you should go to the tutorials section of mopar scape and add some cool stuff to your server to make it different and unique so people play it instead of taking pimpscape and changing the name to fagscape or sumthing gay like that. make unique editions to express your self/style so people will be attracted to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Getting started on creating a server

item.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:
@xunb3atabl3x wrote:

download hamachi, open it up, look down bottom of ham screen there will be 3 circles with icons down bottom, click the middle one (join or create) click create, choose a network name and a pass for that network.

then go into your source files and compile then runserer

Read full topic
